Traffic turning to the left may filter if the is clear
Traffic going straight may proceed if road clear

text: Which statement is true about Double Prohibition lines?

answers.text: No vehicle may at anytime be driven on left hand side of this line
Can not be crossed at anytime
No vehicle may at anytime be driven on right hand side of this line Increase speed

text: When approaching a level crossing, what must you do? What is the maximum speed limit on wide tar

answers.text: Reduce speed and be ready to stop
There is no maximum speed limit

text: roads? Which car stops?

answers.text: Either of the two Car A Car B

text: What is the general speed limit in an urban area?
This sign regulates that:

answers.text: Vehicles allowed to turn to the right only

text: When approaching this sign I should:

answers.text: Engage lower gear Switch on my spot lights and sidelights

text: When travelling behind another vehicle at night I must: Which is the correct robot light sequence?

answers.text: Amber, Red, Green Red, Amber, Green Green, Red, Amber

text: A continuous white line in the centre of the road:

answers.text: May cross if there is no oncoming traffic
May be crossed in a rural area and game parks
May not be crossed under any circumstances.

text: At this intersection which car would be breaking the law?
Which of the following vehicles is not subject to carrying a fire extinguisher?

answers.text: A motor vehicle which is not yet registered
A public service vehicle which is not carrying passengers

text: A motor vehicle towing two trailers should carry:
Breakdown triangles should be placed within

answers.text: 20 - 45 meters from the nearest point of breakdown vehicle
30 - 50 meters from the nearest point of breakdown vehicle
25 - 60 meters from the nearest point of breakdown vehicle

text: To drive a Taxicab you must have reached at least the age of:
Which car moves SECOND at this intersection?
At a robot controlled intersection where you have stopped over pedestrian crossing lines, do you:

answers.text: Decide to carry on in order not to obstruct

text: When temporarily parked by the side of the road at night, one must leave:

answers.text: Your tail lights and side lights on.

text: When approaching an animal drawn vehicle:

answers.text: You blow your horn and pass quickly
You slow down and pass through the safer side

text: You may overtake:

answers.text: When there is a continuous white line
When there are two or more lanes going the same direction

text: You may drive without a safety belt:

answers.text: When you are driving very fast

text: The hooter is only used:

answers.text: When there are animals in the road.
When brakes suddenly fail and there is accident danger.

text: A weight restriction is usually associated with
A blind spot on a road is a part of the road

answers.text: Not covered by rear view mirror
Where visibility is poor due to mist
Directly in front of where the vehicle is moving towards

text: When approaching this sign I am expected to:
Which car goes first?
At this sign I should:

answers.text: Stop and give way to cross traffic
Slow down and proceed if there is no traffic
Stop and proceed when the road is clear both sides.

text: This sign warns of:

answers.text: Possibility of congestion on road ahead

text: In case of a rear wheel tyre burst, I

answers.text: Avoid braking completely and control the steering whee
Do whatever comes to mind Red on white background

text: What are the colours of a private vehicle registration plates? When travelling at high speed on a main road, I signal

answers.text: Black on yellow background at least 50m before I turn at least 100m before I turn at least 7,5m before I turn

text: Direction arrows used in conjunction with prohibition lines on a road surface: Which car stops?

answers.text: Car A Car B Car C

text: Which car moves last at this intersection?
Which car goes last?

Converging lanes means
Hazard perception means

answers.text: Reading a traffic situation in advance

text: When you see an animal in the road you

answers.text: Increase speed to run it over
Reduce speed and stop when necessary

text: What is the incorrect sequence of a robot?
In an urban area, which car has the right of way?

answers.text: The one which enters the intersection first

text: Animal drawn vehicles must always have
When stopping a motor vehicle on a road except in traffic, where will you stop?

answers.text: On the extreme right of the road
Stop in the middle if it is safe to do so
On the extreme left of the road or in an authorized parking place

text: How far from a corner are you forbidden to stop your vehicle?
When under the influence of drugs or alcohol what must you do?

answers.text: Drive slowly to a safe place
Drive on the extreme left of the road

text: The insignia of a command sign is:
On which side must you overtake animals which are being led:
What are the directions given by fixed or flashing amber robot at an intersection?

answers.text: Give precedence to all cross traffic
Give precedence to all vehicles coming the right
Give precedence to vehicles coming from left

text: Which car goes first?
When traveling at 60km/h, what distance should you leave between your vehicle and the vehicle in front?
When a fire engine, ambulance or police vehicle approaches sounding its special warning device, what

answers.text: Move out of its course and stop
Move slowly on the left side

text: What time should persons driving on the road switch on their headlights?
If you are dazzled by the light of other vehicle, what must you do?

answers.text: Dip, get out of the way and slow down

text: When you are driving and feel sleepy, what must you do?

answers.text: Move off the road and rest

text: All vehicles shall have:

answers.text: Either red or white reflectors in front

text: The law says when driving a motor vehicle at 6.00am the vehicle must have its headlights lit:
In a traffic circle, I shall indicate:
A vehicle turning right should

answers.text: Give way to window shopping pedestrians
Give way to pedestrians standing on the pavement.

text: What is the legal maximum speed on a Zimbabwean Highway?

answers.text: Between 80 and 120 km/h on all roads.
120km/h for light vehicles and 80km/h for heavy vehicles

text: Which car goes last?
Which car goes last?
What must you do before you change direction?

answers.text: Signal my intention when turning left only
Signal my intention when turning right
Signal my intention before acting and see the road is clear before changing direction

text: This sign regulates:
This sign regulates that:

answers.text: Vehicles should give precedence to traffic oncoming from the road on the right
Vehicles should give precedence to traffic coming from the left
Vehicles should give precedence to all traffic

text: When travelling at 75km/h I must leave a gap of:
Which car goes last?
Which car gives right of way?
When in a straight ahead lane at an intersection I am not allowed to:

answers.text: Turn without requesting Turn without checking blind spots

text: At a bridge, I am not allowed to:

answers.text: Slow down and check the road ahead
Dip my lights even for oncoming vehicles

text: A speed restriction sign means:

answers.text: Do not exceed the stated speed
Do not exceed the stated speed

text: When I intend to stop on the road I must:

answers.text: Slow down, check the rear view mirror stop

text: At a rail level crossing with open booms a driver should

answers.text: Stop and look to the right

text: The purpose of the parking brake is to

answers.text: Keep the vehicle stationary on a gradient

text: At a pedestrian cross every driver must

answers.text: B.Hoot when it is his turn to go
C.Wait patiently and proceed when appropriate
